snippet.title: Kid Pilot - Official Launch Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description: Kid Pilot is a flight adventure game where you soar through amazing worlds just by moving your hand. Explore beautiful environments, earn badges, discover secrets, overcome challenging boss fights, and become a Top Pilot. Kid Pilot is available now for Meta Quest and PC (Steam VR).
